description:
The Origami family moves quickly, investigating Osafune Girls` School and Minoseki Academy under the suspicion of their participation in large-scale terrorist attacks. With Mokusa`s headquarters attacked and on the brink of total destruction, the girls once again reaffirm their resolve. With Akane and Friedman`s assistance the girls launch a desperate plan in order to take Origami Yukari down once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll
